sql.if: and user_id is null and timeout is null and menu_cn_name like CONCAT('%',#{menu_cn_name},'%') ORDER BY limt_res_set_prop desc
and user_id is null and timeout is not null and menu_cn_name like CONCAT('%',#{menu_cn_name},'%') ORDER BY limt_time_res_set_prop desc
and menu_cn_name like CONCAT('%',#{menu_cn_name},'%') ORDER BY limt_user_res_set_prop desc
and lentrust_set_prop in ('1','0') and menu_cn_name like CONCAT('%',#{menu_cn_name},'%') ORDER BY lentrust_set_prop desc

mapper.select: select parm_val from sys_glabal_parm where parm_title in('ip_set','st_ip_val','ed_ip_val')
select parm_val from sys_glabal_parm where parm_title in('ldap_set','ldap_mask')
select ldap_prop from sys_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select distinct f.res_id,f.cnt from sys_res_conf f inner join sys_menu u on f.res_id=u.menu_id and u.menu_state=1 where f.limt_res_set_prop='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER_ACCESS_LOG WHERE MENU_ID = #{resId}
select distinct f.res_id,f.cnt,f.timeout from sys_res_conf f inner join sys_menu u on f.res_id=u.menu_id and u.menu_state=1 where f.limt_time_res_set_prop='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER_ACCESS_LOG WHERE MENU_ID = #{resId} AND LOG_TIME> DATE_SUB(NOW( ), INTERVAL #{timeout} SECOND )
select distinct f.res_id,f.cnt,f.timeout,f.user_id from sys_res_conf f inner join sys_menu u on f.res_id=u.menu_id and u.menu_state=1 where f.limt_user_res_set_prop='1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER_ACCESS_LOG WHERE MENU_ID = #{resId} AND LOG_TIME> DATE_SUB( NOW( ), INTERVAL #{timeout} SECOND ) and USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_state=0, upd_time =now() where menu_id in(${ids})
mapper.select: select s.*,f.menu_id,f.menu_cn_name from sys_res_conf s INNER JOIN sys_menu f on s.res_id = f.menu_id
select s.*,f.menu_id,f.menu_cn_name,u.user_name,u.user_real_name from sys_res_conf s INNER JOIN sys_menu f on s.res_id = f.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user u on s.user_id = u.user_id

select s.*,f.menu_id,f.menu_cn_name,u.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_real_name from sys_res_conf s INNER JOIN sys_menu f on s.res_id = f.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user u on s.user_id = u.user_id where sys_id = #{sys_id}

mapper.select: select s.sys_id,s.parm_title,s.parm_val from sys_glabal_parm s where parm_title in ('many_wit_set','wit_val')
